ol.li: Safe clearance vertically and horizontally is required around railway right of ways. This means no structures, abutments, or obstructions along the track where either rail or Space employees may need access. This includes unloading shed access ways or other structures along tracks.
Railway clearances shall be in accordance to local legislation and communicated to all affected employees.
Any areas not meeting these clearance requirements shall be posted with regional railroad standard “NO CLEARANCE” signs.
